name: franklin-a-pat-on-the-back-mixed-reviews
title: Franklin: A Pat On the Back [Mixed Reviews]
author: Morgan Levy
excerpt: We’re celebrating withour neighbors in Franklin, who made the list of Money Magazine’s 100 Best Places To Live. They’re the only Tennessee city to make the list, and at #45, they’re making us very proud [via Post Politics].  Photo by kmoliver.
contentEncoded:
We’re celebrating withour neighbors in Franklin, who made the list of Money Magazine’s 100 Best Places To Live. They’re the only Tennessee city to make the list, and at #45, they’re making us very proud [via Post Politics]. 

Photo by kmoliver.
